titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to add meningococcal vaccines to the list of taxable vaccines for purposes of the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/12/2005--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include any meningococcal vaccine as a taxable vaccine for excise tax purposes.
